column1: Local Foods////Cool place in he Village. Asian salad was awesome. Light/airy minimalist decor
column3: exposed brick and steel framing. Grab a cardboard menu as you walk in the door so you're not standing in line wondering what they offer. Kind of place you order at the counter
column4: then they bring the food to your table. Seems like a nice mix of clientele - West U well educated types and Rice students. Maybe a hint of Â preppy but more in background so tolerable.
